title: @konemono Nostr Web Components
description: A component library for easily integrating Nostr protocol into your web applications

profile.description: Display user profiles with options for full profile or name-only display modes.

list.description: Display lists of Nostr events based on filter criteria with customizable limit settings.

demo.title: Demo
demo.description: Below are live examples of the components in action. See how each component functions in real-time.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Instructions on how to integrate nostr-web-components into your web page.

cdn.title: Load from CDN
cdn.description: The easiest way is to load the script via CDN.

usage.title: Basic Usage
usage.description: By using <nostr-container>, relay information can be shared with all child components.

standalone.title: Use Individually
standalone.description: You can also use each component independently without <nostr-container>.

override.title: Override Relays
override.description: Specify the relays attribute for each component to override the parent setting.
